titles.title: A bill for the relief of Rajani Lal.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Immigration, Refugees, and International Law.
Reported to House (Amended) by House Committee on The Judiciary. Report No: 100-847.
Called up by House on Call of Private Calendar.
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

calendar.text: Committee on Judiciary. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Judiciary. Reported to Senate by Senator Biden without amendment. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 1112.

action.text: Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.

vote.text: Passed Senate with an amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
House Concurred, in Senate Amendments , with Amendments by Voice Vote.
Message on House action received in Senate and held at desk: House amendment to Senate amendment.

vote.text: Senate agreed to the House amendment to the Senate amendment by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 2/4/1988--Introduced. Authorizes the classification of a named individual as a child within the meaning of the Immigration and Nationality Act.
